paramInformation.description: Base on 1s unit, it suggest to be set above 30s

paramInformation.label: Factory Setting
paramInformation.description: Restore the factory setting - write only, set to 85 to reset

metadata.inclusion: In normal working interface, press & hold S4 to enter interface for adding Z-Wave network. Before device added into network, “- - -” will display on the screen. Then press S4 once, device will enter learning mode to get a node ID. If adding is succeed, a node ID will display on the screen in a few seconds
metadata.exclusion: In normal working interface, press & hold S4 to enter interface for removing of Z-Wave network. Before device removed from network, node ID will display on the screen. Then press S4 once, device will remove from network. If removing is succeed, “- - -” will display on the screen in a few seconds.
metadata.reset: In shutdown state, long press S3+S5 synchronically can enter into secret menu. Press S4 or S5 to enter code 1234. Touch S3 to enter setting interface. Choose P18, change 53 to 55, and press S3 to confirm
